block.the_bumblezone.filled_porous_honey: 꿀이 찬 다공성 벌집 조각 블록
item.the_bumblezone.music_disc_flight_of: Rimsky Korsakov - Flight of the Bumblebee
item.the_bumblezone.honey_compass_struct: 꿀 나침반이 목표 구조물을 찾지 못했습니다.
entity.the_bumblezone.beehemoth_queen.ad: '여왕벌의 퀘스트' 발전 과제를 초기화하려면 빈 손으로 다시 우클릭하세요
entity.the_bumblezone.beehemoth_queen.me: 당신의 업적 달성을 축하합니다! '여왕벌의 퀘스트' 발전 과제 시리즈를 다시 시작하려면, 빈 손으로 여왕벌을 우클릭해서 시리즈를 초기화하세요.
enchantment.the_bumblezone.comb_cutter.d:
벌집, 벌통, 밀랍을 빠르게 캘 수 있습니다.
벌집과 벌통에서 벌집 조각을 더 많이 얻을 수 있습니다.
enchantment.the_bumblezone.potent_poison:
언데드가 아닌 몹이 맞으면 맹독에 걸립니다.
마법 부여 레벨이 높을수록 더 센 맹독을 더 오래 부여합니다.
enchantment.the_bumblezone.neurotoxins.d:
언데드가 아닌 몹이 맞으면 마비에 걸릴 수 있습니다.
몹의 체력이 많을수록 마비에 걸릴 확률이 낮습니다.
범블존 내의 모든 벌들이 당신에게 화를 냅니다. 더 강해지고 더 흉푝해지게 하는 여러 효과가 벌들에게 부여됩니다. 근처에 있는 벌집 유충 블록도 유충의 성장을 가속화하고 벌을 더 빨리 생산합니다.

벌을 다치게 하거나, 꿀이 찬 다공성 벌집 조각 블록에서 꿀을 채취하거나, 벌집 유충 블록을 캐거나, 꿀 블록을 캘 때 이 효과가 부여됩니다. 벌의 보호 효과 없이 벌집 미로 구조물에 들어갈 때도 이 효과가 부여됩니다.
effect.the_bumblezone.protection_of_the_:
당신에게 화난 근처의 모든 벌들을 진정시킵니다. 만약 이 효과를 가진 몹이 공격받을 경우, 벌들은 그 공격자에게 화냅니다. 이 효과를 부여 받고 있으면 그 어떤 경우에라도 벌의 분노 효과가 부여되지 않습니다. 다만, 벌을 다치게 하거나 벌집 유충 블록을 캐면 벌의 보호 효과가 사라집니다.

벌에게 먹이를 주거나 벌집 유충 블록에 먹이를 줄 때 이 효과가 부여됩니다.
effect.the_bumblezone.beenergized.descri:
날 수 있는 대부분의 몹에게 나는 속도를 더 빠르게 합니다. 호박벌 흉갑을 입고 있는 플레이어는 더 멀리, 더 오래 날 수 있습니다.

벌 떡을 섭취하면 이 효과가 부여됩니다.
effect.the_bumblezone.hidden.description:
적대적 몹에게 들키는 거리를 줄여줍니다. 화난 벌떼가 당신을 추적하지 못하게 할 때도 효과적입니다.

꽃가루덩이 블록에 숨을 때 이 효과가 부여됩니다.
effect.the_bumblezone.paralyzed.descript:
몹에게 마비를 일으켜서 움직일 수 없게 만듭니다. 몹의 AI와 움직임이 잠시 멈춥니다. 일부 몹은 이 효과에 저항할 수 있으며, 마녀가 물약을 마시는 것과 비슷한 행동을 보입니다.

이 효과는 마비가 마법 부여된 무기로 맞을 경우 부여됩니다.
stat.the_bumblezone.carpenter_bee_boots_: Bz: 어리호박벌 부츠로 블록을 캔 횟수
Bz: 어리호박벌 부츠로 벽에 매달린 시간
stat.the_bumblezone.stingless_bee_helmet: Bz: 부봉침 벌 투구에 벌이 앉은 시간
stat.the_bumblezone.honey_bee_leggings_f: Bz: 꿀벌 레깅스에 꽃가루를 묻힌 횟수
system.the_bumblezone.missing_dimension: 서버를 다시 시작해주세요. 범블존 차원이 아직 만들어지지 않았습니다. 아마 이 버그가 이유일 수도 있습니다: %s
system.the_bumblezone.failed_teleporting: 개체를 텔레포트 하는 데 실패했습니다. 텔레포트 중단. 다시 시도하세요.
system.the_bumblezone.require_hive_block: 범블존 텔레포트 실패. 벌집 및 벌통 아래에 특정 블록이 필요합니다.
command.the_bumblezone.invalid_data_arg: The data argument is invalid. Please pick one of the suggestion's entries.
command.the_bumblezone.invalid_entity_ar: The entity argument is missing for this data request. Please pick an entity from the suggestion's entries.
command.the_bumblezone.have_bee_essence: 당신에게는 벌의 정수가 이미 부여되어 있습니다!
command.the_bumblezone.does_not_have_bee: 당신에게는 벌의 정수가 부여되어 있지 않습니다...
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_no: 이 명령어를 사용 가능하게 하려면 먼저 여왕벌의 퀘스트 발전 과제를 시작해야 합니다...
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_cr: You crafted %s beehives for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_be: You bred %s bees for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_fl: You spawned %s flowers from thrown Pollen Puff for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_ho: You drank %s Honey Bottles for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_be: You shot %s Bee Stingers from Bows/Crossbows for Queens Desire advancement
You saved %s Bees by adding back their stingers for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_po: You hit %s mobs with thrown Pollen Puff for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_ho: You bred %s new Honey Slimes for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_be: You fed bees %s times with honey-like items for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_qu: You traded %s times with Queen Bee for Queens Desire advancement
command.the_bumblezone.queens_desired_ki: You killed %s %s for Queens Desire advancement
You killed %s %s for Queens Desire advancement (Advancement requires killing this mob with all 4 Bee Armor equipped however)
You killed %s %s for Queens Desire advancement (Advancement requires killing this mob with Stinger Spear however)
advancements.the_bumblezone.root.title: The Buzzing Bumbling Bumblezone!
advancements.the_bumblezone.beenergized_: 벌 떡을 벌에게 먹여서 최고 속도를 내게 하세요! 붕붕! 아마 꿀과 꽃가루로 만들 수 있을 겁니다.
advancements.the_bumblezone.queen_beehem: Regal Friends Till The Very End!
비히모스와의 친밀도를 최고로 높여서 친구가 되어 주세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.walk_into_po: Tons Of Pollen Can't Bee Healthy...
advancements.the_bumblezone.fall_onto_po: 높은 곳에서 두꺼운 꽃가루덩이 블록으로 떨어지세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.bee_drop_pol: 젖은 스폰지로 벌에 묻은 꽃가루를 씻으세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.pollen_puff_: 꽃가루가 묻지 않은 벌에게 꽃가루덩이를 던져서 캐치볼 놀이를 하세요!
수분해서 키 큰 꽃을 많이 만드세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.teleport_to_: 벌집/벌통을 향해 엔더 진주를 던져서 범블존 차원으로 들어가세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.teleport_out: 굉장히 빠른 낙하 속도로 범블존을 떠나세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.teleport_to_: 피스톤에 의해 벌집/벌통에 눌려지는 방법으로 범블존 차원으로 들어가세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_all_m: 떠돌이 상인과의 거래를 통해 벌 관련 음반을 획득하세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_bucket: 아기 벌에게 먹여서 곧바로 어른 벌로 자라게 하세요
꿀 양동이로 벌들이 사랑에 빠지게 하세요!
벌집 유충 블록에 꿀 양동이를 사용해서 벌 유충이 자라게 하세요
꿀 양동이를 1개 사용해서 2개 이상의 다공성 벌집 조각 블록을 꿀로 채우세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.getting_prot: 벌집 유충 블록에 먹이를 줘서 벌의 보호 효과를 받으세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_permis: 벌의 보호 효과를 받고 있는 동안, 꿀이 찬 다공성 벌집 조각 블록에서 꿀을 채취하거나 꿀 블록을 캐세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_honey: 어떻게 하면 꿀 수정을 아이템으로 얻을 수 있을지 알아내세요. 아마 정교한 손길이라던가...
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_glist: 반짝이는 꿀 수정을 부서뜨리지 않고 획득하세요. 조심스러운 손길이 필요할겁니다...
advancements.the_bumblezone.brew_glister: 행운의 물약을 양조하세요! 아마 반짝이는 꿀 수정이 도움이 될 거예요.
advancements.the_bumblezone.cleanup_stic: 끈적이는 꿀 찌꺼기들을 젖은 스폰지로 씻어내세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_crysta: 꿀 수정 방패의 약점을 알아내세요. 도끼 말구요.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_maxed: 모루를 사용해 제일 단단한 꿀 수정 방패를 단조하세요! 수리를 많이 해야 할 겁니다.
advancements.the_bumblezone.comb_cutter_: 밀랍을 빨리 조각할 수 있는 '벌집 절단' 마법이 부여된 도구를 획득하세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.beeswax_to_b: 벌집 밀랍으로 벌집을 만드는 레시피를 발견하세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.comb_cutter_: 벌집 절단 마법이 부여된 도구를 사용해 벌집/벌통에서 더 많은 아이템을 획득하세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.sugar_water_: Soon... It'll All Be Sugar Canes!
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_sugar: 설탕이 묻은 이상한 돌을 획득하세요. 아마 달달한 물로 용암을 식히면 될겁니다...
advancements.the_bumblezone.protection_o: 벌의 보호 효과를 받고 있는 상태에서 당신을 공격한 몹에게 벌이 화나게 하세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.extended_wra: 벌의 분노 효과를 받고 있는 상태에서 실수로 벌을 공격하세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.food_removed: 화난 벌떼에 음식을 줘서 달래보세요! 살아날 수 있다면요.
advancements.the_bumblezone.trigger_reds: 특수한 꿀 막으로부터 레드스톤 파워를 생성하세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.enter_cell_m: 벌집 미로를 찾아서 들어가세요! (벌의 보호 효과를 받고 있지 않다면 조심하세요!)
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_cocoon: 아이템을 널부러뜨리지 않고 꿀 자루를 조심스레 캘 방법을 찾으세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.stinger_spea: 벌침 창을 사용해서 상대를 맹독에 걸리게 하세요!
벌침 창을 사용해서 상대에게 마비를 일으키세요!
벌침 창을 사용해서 아주 강한 상대에게 마비를 일으키세요!
벌침 창을 아주 멀리 던져서 몹을 죽이세요
벌들이 제공하는 최고의 방어구와 무기로 무장하세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.carpenter_be: 어리호박벌 부츠를 신고 웅크려서 원목, 잎, 벌집 등의 특정 블록을 캐세요!
어리호박벌 부츠를 신고 원목, 잎, 벌집 등 특정 블록의 벽에 오랜 시간 매달리세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_bee_le: 꽃을 가로질러 다니면서 꿀벌 레깅스에 꽃가루를 묻히세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_c: It's a Bird! It's a Plane! No it's...
호박벌 흉갑을 입고 가능한 한 오래 날으세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.stingless_be: 부봉침 벌 투구의 힘으로 한번에 100마리 이상의 벌에게 발광 효과를 부여하세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_compas: Is this even still a compass..?
advancements.the_bumblezone.bee_cannon_f: 벌 대포를 최대한 많이 장전하고 쏘세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.crystal_cann: 꿀 수정 대포를 최대한 많이 장전하고 쏘세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.bee_stinger_: 활이나 쇠뇌으로 벌침을 계속 쏴서 몹을 마비시키세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.essence_infu: 벌의 정수를 섭취하세요! 여왕벌의 퀘스트를 모두 완수하신 것을 축하드립니다!
advancements.the_bumblezone.drink_royal_: 로열 젤리 병을 섭취하고 힘을 얻으세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_royal: 로열 젤리 양동이를 획득하세요. 여왕벌도 좋아하는 것 같네요...
advancements.the_bumblezone.royal_jelly_: 끈끈이 피스톤 옆에 로열 젤리 블록을 놓으세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.carve_carvab: 조각 가능한 밀랍으로 모든 작품을 조각해보세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.light_soul_i: 향초에 파란 불꽃을 붙이세요! 영혼 관련된 뭔가를 해야 할 거예요.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_all_c: 모든 색깔의 커다란 양초를 한번씩 다 가지세요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.projectile_l: 해로운 효과를 즉시 부여하는 향초에 발사체로 불을 붙이세요
advancements.the_bumblezone.enter_garden: 위를 보세요! 매달려 있는 커다란 정원을 찾을 수 있을 거예요!
advancements.the_bumblezone.grow_crystal: 결정꽃에 아이템과 경험치를 줘서 완전히 자라게 하세요! (결정꽃을 우클릭해서 UI를 여세요)
advancements.the_bumblezone.enchant_crys: 비용이 5 이상 드는 마법을 책에 부여하세요. (결정꽃을 우클릭해서 UI를 여세요)
advancements.the_bumblezone.the_queens_d: 24마리의 벌에게 벌침을 다시 줘서 죽음으로부터 구하세요
벌에게 설탕물이나 꿀 관련 식품을 먹여서 배고픔을 채우세요. 64번 이상요! (같은 벌로 해도 되고 다른 벌로 해도 됩니다.)
벌 대포로 벌을 엔더 드래곤에게 쏴서 당신의 결단을 보여주세요
'여왕벌의 퀘스트' 발전 과제를 모두 완료하세요! 여왕벌을 우클릭해 최종 보상을 얻으세요!
16마리의 새끼 벌이 나올 때까지 벌을 번식시키세요
벌침 창으로 위더를 어떻게든 죽이는데 성공하세요...
꽃가루덩이를 던져서 48마리의 몹을 맞히세요. 플레이어를 맞히는 것도 포함됩니다!
꿀 슬라임을 16번 번식시키세요. (꿀 슬라임은 설탕을 아주 좋아해요!)
'여왕벌의 퀘스트' 발전 과제 시리즈가 당신에게 주어졌습니다. 모두 완료하고 보상을 받으세요!
벌 보호구 풀셋을 입고 엔더 드래곤을 학살해서 전설의 영웅이 되세요
the_bumblezone.porous_honeycomb_block.de: A honeycomb block filled with holes! You can store honey into this block with Honey Bottles or Honey Buckets.
the_bumblezone.filled_porous_honeycomb_b:
A honeycomb block filled to the brim with honey! You can take honey out of this block with a Glass Bottle. However, this may anger nearby bees. 

 When mined, this block drops Porous Honeycomb Block and some Honeycombs. The drop is affect by Fortune or you can use Silk Touch to keep the block intact. 

 This block also give off a Redstone signal of 1 when a Comparator is facing this block.
the_bumblezone.empty_honeycomb_brood_blo: A honeycomb block with a large hole that has nothing inside. Can be revived with Buzzier Bee's Bottled bee item or with Potion of Bee's bee potions!
the_bumblezone.honeycomb_brood_block.des:
A larva living in a giant hole inside a honeycomb block! The larva will grow slowly through 4 stages (faster in The Bumblezone dimension) and when it is at the final stage, it has a chance of spawning a Bee or Honey Slime in front of the block! You can speed up the block by feeding it Sugar Water Bottles, Honey Bottles, Honey Buckets, or certain other mod's honey items by hand or with a Dispenser. 

 Glass Bottles can take honey from this block but the block will turn into an Empty Honeycomb Brood Block and nearby bees will be mad that you killed a larva! 

 This block will also output a Redstone signal between 1 and 4 based on the growth stage of the larva inside when a Comparator is facing this block. 

 See Bumblezone's mod page for more info about mod compat with this block.
the_bumblezone.sugar_infused_cobblestone: A decorative block created when Sugar Water meets Lava tagged fluids. Mining this block will drop Cobblestone and Sugar unless you use Silk Touch instead. You can burn the sugar out of this block with a Furnace for some EXP.
the_bumblezone.sugar_infused_stone.descr: A decorative block created when Lava tagged fluids touches still Sugar Water. Mining this block will drop Cobblestone and Sugar unless you use Silk Touch instead. You can burn the sugar out of this block with a Furnace for some EXP.
the_bumblezone.sticky_honey_residue.desc:
A super sticky residue that's made from melting down Honey Crystals, Honey Crystal Shards, or Honey Blocks in a furnace. 

This block slows any mob in contact with it and can be used to climb up walls as well. 
 Mining this block will be slow and drops nothing. To quickly get rid of this block, right click it while holding Water Bottle, Water Bucket, Wet Sponge, Sugar Water Bottle, or Sugar Water Bucket as if you are rinsing the surface. This block will also be destroyed instantly if any flowing fluid runs through it or a piston pushes it.
the_bumblezone.sticky_honey_redstone.des:
A very useful Redstone mechanic block made from combining Sticky Honey Residue with Redstone Dust. It has all of the same traits as Sticky Honey Residue but will also output a Redstone signal of 1 when a mob is trapped in the block. 

The power will be sent to the block it is attached on and through that block as well. It will also power anything attached to the sides if this block is attached on the floor.
the_bumblezone.beehive_beeswax.descripti: A decorative block that forms the ceiling/floor boundaries of the Bumblezone dimension and can be used to craft Bee Nests blocks.
the_bumblezone.honey_crystal.description:
Non-renewable decorative block found throughout The Bumblezone dimension either in caves or underwater. The block can be placed on any solid surface including being sideways or upside-down. This block can be waterlogged with any water-tagged fluid but when done so, the fluid in the block turns into Sugar Water. 

When broken without Silk Touch, this block drops Honey Crystal Shards (drop rates affected by Fortune).
the_bumblezone.honey_crystal_shards.desc: A shard of a Honey Crystal that can be either eaten to restore small amounts of hunger, melted in a Furnace to make Sticky Honey Residue, or be used to craft and repair Honey Crystal Shield.
the_bumblezone.sugar_water_bucket.descri: Bucket holding Sugar Water fluid. Can be obtained by crafting Water Bucket with Sugar or using an empty Bucket on Sugar Water. Can be used in Dispensers too!
the_bumblezone.sugar_water_bottle.descri:
A bottle holding Sugar Water. This can be obtained by using a bottle on Sugar Water. 

Drinking this item will restore very little hunger but will give you Haste for a brief period of time. 

Can be fed to Honeycomb Brood Block for a change to grow the larva up one stage. Can also be fed to Bees to heal them along with a chance to remove Wrath of the Hive effect off of you.
the_bumblezone.sugar_water_still.descrip:
A fluid that is Water infused with Sugar. Any mobs in it is slowed slightly more than regular water. This fluid can be found in The Bumblezone dimension, crafted by Water Bucket with Sugar, or obtained from waterlogging Honey Crystal Block.
 Overall, Sugar Water will have much of the same behavior as regular water because this fluid has a water tag. This means you can hydrate Farmland or keep coral alive with this fluid. 


 This fluid will heal any bee touching it if the bee is not currently taking damage. Furthermore, this fluid will grow Sugar Cane much faster if placed next to the plant (this effect can be stacked up to 4 times). 

 When this fluid comes in contact with any other fluid that has a lava tag, this fluid will turn into either Sugar Infused Cobblestone or Sugar Infused Stone blocks.
the_bumblezone.honey_fluid_still.descrip:
A delicious fluid of honey! It flows very slowly and will slow mobs in it significantly. Non-player mobs and boats tends to sink into the Honey Fluid as if it is a sticky trap! 

 Can be picked up with a Bucket or Glass Bottle and it will heal any hurt bee that flies into the fluid. 

 When this fluid comes in contact with any other fluid that has a lava tag, this fluid will turn into either Sugar Infused Cobblestone or Sugar Infused Stone blocks.
the_bumblezone.royal_jelly_bucket.descri:
A bucket sloppily holding extremely rare and valuable form of honey created by the Bee Queen! 

 Can be fed to bees to give extremely high and insanely long lived Beenergized effect (and also turns Beehemoths straight into Queen Behemoths). Trading this back to the Bee Queen can give you a chance at extremely valuable rewards! 

 Can be obtained by using an empty Bucket on Royal Jelly Fluid or created from 4 Royal Jelly Bottles plus a Bucket. Can be used in Dispensers too!
the_bumblezone.royal_jelly_bottle.descri:
A super amazing form of honey from the Bee Queen from a royalty recipe passed down for generations! 

Drinking this item will restore high amount of Hunger, Speed Boost, and Beenergized level 2! It will also remove Poison, Weakness, and Slowness status effects when drank as well. 

 You can trade this item back to the Bee Queen for a chance at some valuable rewards! 

 Can be fed to bees to give extremely high and long lived Beenergized effect (and also grants very high friendship points with Beehemoths).
the_bumblezone.royal_jelly_fluid_still.d:
A specially brewed honey of bee royalty! It flows very slowly and will slow mobs in it significantly. Non-player mobs and boats tends to sink into the Royal Jelly Fluid as if it is a sticky trap! 

 Can be picked up with a Bucket or Glass Bottle and it will heal any hurt bee that flies into the fluid and give them a Beenergized and Regenerative effect. 

 When this fluid comes in contact with any other fluid that has a lava tag, this fluid will turn into either Sugar Infused Cobblestone or Sugar Infused Stone blocks.
the_bumblezone.royal_jelly_block.descrip: A solidified storage form of Royal jelly! It behaves similar to vanilla's Honey Block except for the fact that it can only be "pulled" by pistons and not pushed! Give it some thought and see what kind of awesome moving redstone builds you can do with this!
the_bumblezone.honey_crystal_shield.desc:
Created from Honey Crystal Shards, this shield starts off very weak but become stronger the more you repair it with Honey Crystal Shards in an Anvil. At maximum level, this shield has about double the durability of Vanilla's Shield. 

However, this shield will always take massive damage when blocking explosive or fire damage. 

 This shield will briefly slow any mob that deals physical damage to the shield and furthermore, this shield can be enchanted with Unbreaking, Curse of the Binding, and Curse of the Vanishing (No Mending to help keep it balanced).
the_bumblezone.honey_slime_spawn_egg.des: An egg that spawns Honey Slimes which can be bred and used to farm Honey Bottles when a Glass Bottle is used on them. This mob was donated to The Bumblezone by Bagel, Buzzier bees's Creator! Special thanks to them!
the_bumblezone.beehemoth_spawn_egg.descr: An egg that spawns a Beehemoth, a giant Bee! Beehemoth can be tamed with bee feeding items such as Honey Buckets or Honey Bottles and other honey stuff. However, they will only follow you if you hold Honey Buckets. If you feed them, you can eventually tame them, put on a saddle, and ride them! The more you feed and ride them, the more friendship they get which makes them move faster. When friendship is finally maxed out, Beehemoth becomes a Queen Beehemoth and can fly at maximum speed! However, friendship will decrease if Beehemoth takes damage from any source and if they lose all friendship, they will become untamed and unhappy. :(  This mob was donated to The Bumblezone by Aranaira, Alexthe666, and Nooby from the Carrier Bees mod! Special thanks to them!
the_bumblezone.bee_queen_spawn_egg.descr:
An egg that spawns a Bee Queen, a massive passive Bee that wants to trade! Right click while holding items or drop items in front of the Queen Bee to trade. Try trading various items to see what kind of items are possible to receive based what you give! 
 Upon first successful trade you will be given The Queen's Desires advancement path which gives a reward for each advancement completed. 

 After completing the entire advancement path, visit the Bee Queen and right click with empty hand to reset that advancement path for rewards!
the_bumblezone.pollen_puff.description:
A soft ball of clumped pollen! Found when mining Pile of Pollen or unpollinating a bee by right clicking it with wet sponge, water bottle, or water bucket. 

 It can be thrown to create a Pile of Pollen block where-ever it hits. If it hits an unpollinated bee, the bee becomes pollinated. If it hits a panda, it will sneeze. But if it hits an allowed flower, it may cause the flower to reproduce! 

 A Pile of Pollen block slows mobs in it and gives off a ton of pollen particles. It will also pollinate any unpollinated bee that flies into the Pile of Pollen or make Pandas sneeze. It also can be measured by a Redstone Comparator.
the_bumblezone.bee_bread.description: A gross looking pellet created from a fermented blend of pollen and honey. Bees love this and will get a burst of energy that makes them faster if they are fed Bee Bread. You can eat it too for good nutrition but it may make you lightheaded for a second or two...
the_bumblezone.honey_bucket.description:
Bucket holding Honey fluid. Can be obtained by crafting buckets with Honey Bottles and can be reverse crafted back to Honey Bottles too. 

 If used on bees, it will fully heal them. if used on an adult bee, it puts it and nearby bees into love mode! if used on a child bee, it has a chance of growing them into an adult. Can be used in Dispensers too!
the_bumblezone.honey_web.description: A super sticky web of honey! Greatly slows any mobs that gets stuck in it but can easily be cleanse with water or wet sponges. Basically it acts similar to Sticky Honey Residue except Honey Web does not need to be attached to a block.
the_bumblezone.redstone_honey_web.descri: A Redstone variant of Honey Web that will output a Redstone signal when a mob is trapped in it. Redstone Honey Web cannot take in a Redstone signal from a non-Redstone Honey Web block. The rest of its behaviors is the same as Honey Web block.
the_bumblezone.honey_cocoon.description: A strange cocoon made of honey! It can store items within itself. Interestingly, Empty Brood Blocks in the cocoon will consume any bee feeding item and transform into an filled Brood Block! This cocoon will also lose items over time if it is submerged underwater...
the_bumblezone.music_disc_flight_of_the_: If you listen closely, you can still hear the buzzing of a swarm of angry bees... This rare music disc can be obtained from Wandering Traders! The song is a MIDI version of Flight of the Bumblebee by Rimsky Korsakov.
the_bumblezone.music_disc_honey_bee_rat_: Enjoy an awesome banger of a song with bees! This rare music disc can be obtained from Wandering Traders. The song is Honey Bee by Rat Faced Boy and you can purchase it from here: https://acidburp.bandcamp.com/track/honey-bee Always support musicians of your favorite songs!
the_bumblezone.music_disc_la_bee_da_loca: A smoothing tune as you explore the amazing Bumblezone! This rare music disc can be obtained from Wandering Traders. The song is La Bee-da Loca by LudoCrypt and you can purchase it from here: https://ludocrypt.bandcamp.com/track/la-bee-da-loca Always support musicians of your favorite songs!
the_bumblezone.music_disc_bee_laxing_wit: Relax with a calming song that all bees love! This rare music disc can be obtained from Wandering Traders. The song is Bee-laxing with the Hom-bees by LudoCrypt and you can purchase it from here: https://ludocrypt.bandcamp.com/track/bee-laxing-with-the-hom-bees Always support musicians of your favorite songs!
the_bumblezone.bee_stinger.description:
A common gift from the Queen Bee! Can be used as low-damage ammo for Bows and Crossbows to have chances of inflicting poison, weakness, slowness, or paralysis effects on non-undead mobs. 

 Can be right clicked on stinger-less bees to put a stinger back onto them.
the_bumblezone.stinger_spear.description: A fragile but throwable lethal spear utilizing a bee stinger! Can be repaired with Flint or bee Stingers and can be enchanted. It will always inflict a weak poison onto any non undead-mob it hits
the_bumblezone.honey_compass.description: A honey infused compass that when right clicked on beehives/bee nests, it will keep track of the block's position! When you right click the air in Bumblezone dimension, it seems to point to some sort of structure...
the_bumblezone.bee_cannon.description:
A cannon of questionable sturdiness that fires bees! Can store up to 3 bees. Hold down the use button and release to fire the bees! The bees will briefly attack any non-bee entity you were looking at when firing. 

 Can be repaired with Sugar Infused Stone or Sugar Infused Cobblestone.
the_bumblezone.crystal_cannon.descriptio:
A lethal powerful cannon of questionable sturdiness that fires Honey Crystal Shards! Can store up to 3 shards. Hold down the use button and release to fire the shards that come with high damage and knockback! 

 Can be repaired with Honey Crystal Shards, Sugar Infused Stone, or Sugar Infused Cobblestone.
the_bumblezone.carpenter_bee_boots_1.des: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It allows wears to wallrun and jump off off wood, planks, leaves, and honeycomb blocks! If crouching on those blocks, the boots will automine those blocks as well! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all 4 bee armor is on, you will be able to hang on the walls for longer time and will automine those blocks faster.
the_bumblezone.carpenter_bee_boots_2.des: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It allows wears to wallrun and jump off off wood, planks, leaves, and honeycomb blocks! If crouching on those blocks, the boots will automine those blocks as well! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all 4 bee armor is on, you will be able to hang on the walls for longer time and will automine those blocks faster.
the_bumblezone.honey_bee_leggings_1.desc: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It resists slowness from many Bumblezone blocks that cause slowness and can collect pollen from flowers or Pile of Pollens! Crouch to spawn a Pollen Puff when full of pollen. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all 4 bee armor is on, chance of collecting pollen from flowers is improved and Slowness effect duration will decrease twice as fast now!
the_bumblezone.honey_bee_leggings_2.desc: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It resists slowness from many Bumblezone blocks that cause slowness and can collect pollen from flowers or Pile of Pollens! Crouch to spawn a Pollen Puff when full of pollen. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all 4 bee armor is on, chance of collecting pollen from flowers is improved and Slowness effect duration will decrease twice as fast now!
the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_chestplate_1.d: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 4 bee armor is on!
the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_chestplate_2.d: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 4 bee armor is on!
the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_chestplate_tra: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 4 bee armor is on!

An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 4 bee armor is on!
the_bumblezone.stingless_bee_helmet_1.de: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! When couching, all Bees and Beehemoths will be glowing for you. Nausea effect duration will also decrease twice as fast when this armor is on. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. While having all 4 bee armor on, the bee outlining range will be increased and will remain glowing for a brief time after standing up. Furthermore, with the 3 armor on, Nausea effect duration will decrease much faster and now Poison effect duration will decrease twice as fast.
the_bumblezone.stingless_bee_helmet_2.de: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! When couching, all Bees and Beehemoths will be glowing for you. Nausea effect duration will also decrease twice as fast when this armor is on. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. While having all 4 bee armor on, the bee outlining range will be increased and will remain glowing for a brief time after standing up. Furthermore, with the 3 armor on, Nausea effect duration will decrease much faster and now Poison effect duration will decrease twice as fast.
the_bumblezone.essence_of_the_bees.descr:
An end game consumable treasure from the Bee Queen's advancement quest! You can feel the powerful but welcoming aura radiating from the essence itself... When consumed, you get the following bonus permanently:

Can enter Cell Maze and not get Wrath of the Hive effect anymore.

Can enter Throne Pillar and not get Mining Fatigue when near Bee Queen.

Entering Honey Fluid will grant Regenerative effect.

Entering Royal Jelly Fluid will grant a short lived Beenergized effect and stronger Regenerative effect.

Beehive/Bee Nests can be mined, honey taken by bottle, or sheared for honeycombs without angering the bees. No campfire needed!

Can take honey from Filled Porous Honeycomb Blocks safely without getting Wrath of the Hive Effect.

Honey Slime will not get angry at you when you take its honey.
A glowing light source of crystallized honey. Found only in Crystal Canyon biome in Bumblezone.

 Gives a high amount of Honey Crystal Shards when broken or can be smelted into a ton of Sticky Honey Residue. Great for decor or lighting!

 If combined with an Awkward Potion in a Brewing Stand, it will create a Potion of Luck! The most common benefit of Luck status is it may improve the loot drops of certain datapack/modded loot tables.

 Also transform neighboring water source blocks into sugar water.
the_bumblezone.super_candle.description:
A massive decorative bulky candle that gives off a ton of light!

 Can be lit and waterlogged the same way as regular Minecraft Candles. Also can be lit by flaming projectile hits as well. When lit, any mob in the flame will be set on fire while taking low damage.

 Super Candles can be stacked and if Soul Sand/Soul Soil or other soul full blocks is placed under, it gets a soul flame that scares away Piglins!

 If a Comparator is facing the Super Candle Base, it gets a power of 5 when lit. If Comparator is facing the Super Candle Wick, it will get a power of 3 when it is a soul flame and 5 when it is a normal flame. Dispensers can light the Candle too.
the_bumblezone.super_candle_black.descri:
A colored massive decorative bulky candle that gives off a ton of light!

 Can be lit and waterlogged the same way as regular Minecraft Candles. Also can be lit by flaming projectile hits as well. When lit, any mob in the flame will be set on fire while taking low damage.

 Super Candles can be stacked and if Soul Sand/Soul Soil or other soul full blocks is placed under, it gets a soul flame that scares away Piglins!

 If a Comparator is facing the Super Candle Base, it gets a power of 5 when lit. If Comparator is facing the Super Candle Wick, it will get a power of 3 when it is a soul flame and 5 when it is a normal flame. Dispensers can light the Candle too.

A colored massive decorative bulky candle that gives off a ton of light!

 Can be lit and waterlogged the same way as regular Minecraft Candles. Also can be lit by flaming projectile hits as well. When lit, any mob in the flame will be set on fire while taking low damage.

 Super Candles can be stacked and if Soul Sand/Soul Soil or other soul full blocks is placed under, it gets a soul flame that scares away Piglins!

 If a Comparator is facing the Super Candle Base, it gets a power of 5 when lit. If Comparator is facing the Super Candle Wick, it will get a power of 3 when it is a soul flame and 5 when it is a normal flame. Dispensers can light the Candle too.
the_bumblezone.incense_candle.descriptio:
A powerful magical candle that radiates its effects to nearby entities!

 On the surface, this candle has all the same behaviors as the regular Super Candles. Except these powerful Incense Candles can be imbued with different status effects to grant nearby entities based on what potions are used to craft the Incense Candle.

 When the Incense Candle's power runs out, the candle will become unlit. Relighting the candle will restart its status effects it gives. See what kind of Incense Candles you can make based on different potion combinations!
the_bumblezone.carvable_wax.description: A solid block of wax that can be carved by right clicking with Shears or Swords! Also will output power to a Comparator based on what is carved.
the_bumblezone.carvable_wax_wavy.descrip: A solid block of wax that can be carved by right clicking with Shears or Swords! Also will output power to a Comparator based on what is carved.

the_bumblezone.carvable_wax_chains.descr: A solid block of wax that can be carved by right clicking with Shears or Swords! Also will output power to a Comparator based on what is carved.
the_bumblezone.crystalline_flower.descri:
An uncommon flower made of magical honey crystals! Feed it items or experience orb to grow it!

 You can right click it to bring up a screen to feed the flower or add enchantments to books/enchanted books! The higher the flower's tier, the more enchantments you can apply. The level of the enchantments will increase too!

 Max tier will grant you access to 'treasure' marked enchantments!
